kw.name: Connect Server
kw.doc:
Connect tibco EMS server.
Examples: | Connect Server | EMSServerURL | UserName | Password |

kw.name: Send Message
kw.doc:
Send message to topic or queue.
Examples: | ${Message}= | This is a message | | Send Message | ${true} | topicName | ${Message} | | Send Message | ${false} | queueName | ${Message} |

kw.name: Set Property
kw.doc:
Set properties of message.
Examples: | Set Property | OLP_SENDER_ID | CargoSmart | | Set Property | OLP_RECIPIENT_ID | POCS |
